segments.text: Over by the counter, there's another unfolding drama.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A young boy is attempting to raid the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's balanced precariously on a small two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks so wobbly, its legs are splayed outwards.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He stretches upwards, his hand already in the jar, grabbing those sweet treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister stands nearby, eyes wide with anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's got her hand out, clearly expecting her share of the spoils.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're working together, a little team of cookie thieves.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman drying dishes has absolutely no idea what's happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's quite a daring feat for such small children.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They must have been planning this for a while.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope that stool doesn't completely give way.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Oh, to be young and sneak cookies again!
segments.speaker: PAR
